sn22.94:1.2: “Mendicants, I don’t argue with the world; it’s the world that argues with me.
sn22.94:1.3: When your speech is in line with the teaching you don’t argue with anyone in the world.
sn22.94:1.4: What the astute agree on as not existing, I too say does not exist.
sn22.94:1.5: What the astute agree on as existing, I too say exists.
sn22.94:2.1: And what do the astute agree on as not existing, which I too say does not exist?
sn22.94:2.2: Form that is permanent, everlasting, eternal, and imperishable.
sn22.94:2.6: Consciousness that is permanent, everlasting, eternal, and imperishable.
sn22.94:2.7: This is what the astute agree on as not existing, which I too say does not exist.
sn22.94:3.1: And what do the astute agree on as existing, which I too say exists?
sn22.94:3.2: Form that is impermanent, suffering, and perishable.
sn22.94:3.4: Consciousness that is impermanent, suffering, and perishable.
sn22.94:3.5: This is what the astute agree on as existing, which I too say exists.
sn22.94:4.1: There is a temporal phenomenon in the world that the Realized One understands and comprehends.
sn22.94:4.2: Then he explains, teaches, asserts, establishes, clarifies, analyzes, and reveals it.
sn22.94:5.1: And what is that temporal phenomenon in the world?
sn22.94:5.2: Form is a temporal phenomenon in the world that the Realized One understands and comprehends.
sn22.94:5.3: Then he explains, teaches, asserts, establishes, clarifies, analyzes, and reveals it.
sn22.94:6.1: This being so, what can I do about a foolish ordinary person, blind and sightless, who does not know or see?
sn22.94:6.5: Consciousness is a temporal phenomenon in the world that the Realized One understands and comprehends.
sn22.94:6.6: Then he explains, teaches, asserts, establishes, clarifies, analyzes, and reveals it.
sn22.94:7.1: This being so, what can I do about a foolish ordinary person, blind and sightless, who does not know or see?
sn22.94:8.1: Suppose there was a blue water lily, or a pink or white lotus. Though it sprouted and grew in the water, it would rise up above the water and stand with no water clinging to it.
sn22.94:8.2: In the same way, though I was born and grew up in the world, I live having mastered the world, unsullied by the world.”
